Title: ModuKeys Pro X1 Gaming Keyboard
Description: Elevate your gaming experience with the ModuKeys Pro X1. Featuring ultra-responsive mechanical switches, customizable RGB backlighting, and a sleek modern design, this keyboard ensures superior performance and unmatched style.

Title: ModuKeys Compact 75% Keyboard
Description: Experience the perfect balance of compactness and functionality with the ModuKeys Compact 75%. This keyboard offers a space-saving design without compromising on key features, making it ideal for both work and play.

Title: ModuKeys Artisan Series Custom Keyboard
Description: Unleash your creativity with the ModuKeys Artisan Series. Choose from a variety of artistic designs and customize your keyboard to reflect your individual style. Enjoy a keyboard that's not only functional but also a work of art.

Title: ModuKeys Wireless Pro Typist Keyboard
Description: Achieve typing excellence with the ModuKeys Wireless Pro Typist. Enjoy the convenience of wireless connectivity, whisper-quiet mechanical switches, and a minimalist design that complements any workspace.

Specifications.Battery Life: Up to 40 hours on a single charge

Title: ModuKeys Ultra Compact 60% Mechanical Keyboard
Description: Embrace the ultimate in portability with the ModuKeys Ultra Compact 60%. This keyboard is perfect for on-the-go professionals and enthusiasts who demand top-notch mechanical performance in a compact form factor.

Title: ModuKeys Gamer Xtreme RGB Keyboard
Description: Dominate your gaming sessions with the ModuKeys Gamer Xtreme. Featuring dynamic RGB backlighting, ultra-responsive mechanical switches, and customizable macros, this keyboard is built for victory.

Title: ModuKeys Compact 80% Bluetooth Keyboard
Description: Experience the perfect blend of portability and versatility with the ModuKeys Compact 80% Bluetooth Keyboard. Connect to multiple devices wirelessly and enjoy mechanical precision wherever you go.

Specifications.Battery Life: Up to 30 hours on a single charge

Title: ModuKeys Wireless Ergonomic Keyboard
Description: Experience ergonomic comfort without compromising on performance with the ModuKeys Wireless Ergonomic Keyboard. Wireless connectivity, tactile mechanical switches, and a split layout for enhanced typing comfort.

Specifications.Battery Life: Up to 60 hours on a single charge

Title: ModuKeys Artisan Series Minimalist Keyboard
Description: Experience simplicity and elegance with the ModuKeys Artisan Series Minimalist Keyboard. With its clean design and choice of tactile mechanical switches, this keyboard is a statement of minimalist sophistication.

Title: ModuKeys Compact 60% Wireless Mechanical Keyboard
Description: Unchain your productivity with the ModuKeys Compact 60% Wireless Mechanical Keyboard. Enjoy the freedom of wireless connectivity and the precision of mechanical switches in a compact, portable package.

Specifications.Battery Life: Up to 50 hours on a single charge
